title: Climate change and reindeer herding – A bioeconomic model on the impact of climate change on harvesting profits for Saami reindeer herders in Norway and Sweden
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Ecological Economics, Volume 223

Author(s): Irmelin Slettemoen Helgesen, Anne Borge Johannesen, Göran Bostedt, Erlend Dancke Sandorf
